fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Emblem of Severed Fate <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Energy Recharge +20%.
• Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 25% of Energy Recharge. A maximum of 75% bonus DMG can be obtained in this way.

fields.name: Second Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Noblesse Oblige <:2x:957694031343812619>
Thundering Fury <:2x:957694031343812619>*

• Electro DMG Bonus +15%

fields.name: Third Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Thundering Fury <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Electro DMG Bonus +15%
• Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged and Superconduct by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.
